item.title: 02/March - Inspiration class
item.description: Pre Requisites Create an account in code.org website https://studio.code.org/users/sign_up Class Curriculum Section content Expected time (mins) Pre - Requirements Teacher/Student introduction 20-30 mins ❌ Showing the outline of the course: 5-10 mins ❌ Intro to computer science: 20-30 minutes ❌ Small break 5mins ❌ Dance Party 20-30 mins Register code.org Small introduction to what is software/code 20-30 mins ❌ Next class overview 5 mins ❌ Extra resources Exploring how computers work How do computers remember Intro to computer science Next class preparation Basic Command Line
